title: Unchained Melody (Remastered)
plainLyrics:
Oh, my love
My darling
I've hungered for
Your touch
A long
Lonely time

And time
Goes by
So slowly
And time
Can do so much
(So much) Are you
(Are you still mine?) still mine? I...
Need your love

I...
need your love
God...
Speed your love
To... me

Lonely rivers flow
To the sea, to the sea
To the open arms of the sea, yeah
Lonely rivers sigh
"Wait for me, wait for me"
I'll be coming home
Wait for me

Oh, my love
My darling
I've hungered, hungered for your touch
A long
Lonely time
And time...
Goes... by
So slowly
And time can do
So much
Are you
Still mine?
I need your love
I...
I need your love
Godspeed your love
To... me...
